    • Constructor Detail

      • FullMessage

        public FullMessage(long id,
                   java.lang.String protocol,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String from,
                   PayloadT payload)
        Creates a new FullMessage object.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the protocol round the message belongs to.
        protocol - the name of the protocol the message belongs to.
        name - the name of the message (e.g, "ACK", "request", ...)
        from - the source address of the message.
        payload - the content of the message.
